front.title: DRIP Entity Tag (DET) for Unmanned Aircraft System Remote Identification (UAS RID)

abstract.t: This document describes the use of Hierarchical Host Identity Tags (HHITs), updating both [RFC7401] and [RFC7343], as self-asserting IPv6 addresses and thereby a trustable identifier for use as the Unmanned Aircraft System Remote Identification and tracking (UAS RID). Within the context of RID, HHITs will be called DRIP Entity Tags (DET). HHITs self-attest to the included explicit hierarchy that provides Registrar discovery for 3rd-party identifier attestation.
